The photograph was originally posted on: under the props tag, and was filed as a Halloween prop.
The creator of the scarecrow: known as "Marrow," confirmed that the scarecrow was made using newspaper and masking tape.
Marrow provided a backstory for the scar: mentioning that it was a creation and not an actual human corpse. The backstory involved a trespasser being tied to a scarecrow post and left to die while crows pecked at him.
